name: shoopy game beta
description:
SHOOPY's GAME COMING SOON! This game is in very early access and only includes very basic movement that has been updated since this version. CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD THE BETA FOR MY GAME - THIS IS JUST A TEST SCENE FOR MOVEMENT FEEDBACK. GAME IS NOT RELEASED YET!! Install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract Here
  • Double click on shoopy's game.exe
  • enjoy early access gameplay!
